review: I love this device! Interface is simple and easy to use and has all the apps I need on here for watching my favorite movies and shows. Very small and portable, which makes transfers to different TV's a cinch. My parents have the apple TV and I  think  the fire TV has a better interface that is easier to navigate than the apple one.  Would highly recommend getting this product!
author: cc2

review: I just received my new Amazon Fire TV; it was easy to hook-up; I have access to all my Amazon Prime content, including all my photos on Amazon's free image storage, all my music stored in the Amazon cloud. Add Netflix, and Hulu Plus, and I've got more content than I can watch in 100 years. Taking back a big pile of obsolete cable hardware tomorrow and NEVER looking back. This is probably the reason my cable bill increased 61% in one month - cable is a dying industry!
